title: Andrew Carmellini's Whipped Sheep's Milk Ricotta Recipe
full_text:
Andrew Carmellini's Whipped Sheep's Milk Ricotta Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
6 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
cups
ricotta
(preferably sheep's milk)
1/2
cup
whole milk
1
teaspoon
table
salt
1
teaspoon
fleur de sel or
coarse sea salt
1
teaspoon
coarsely
ground black pepper
1
teaspoon
fresh thyme leaves
1
teaspoon
dried oregano
, on the branch if possible
2 to 3
tablespoons
extra-virgin olive oil
Toasted bread
for serving
Optional:
figs
, olives, or truffles for topping
Directions
Beat the ricotta and milk together until the mixture is light and fluffy in a stand mixer on medium speed or in a bowl with a whisk. Add the table salt and mix well.
Place mixture in serving bowl. Sprinkle with the fleur de sel, pepper, thyme, and oregano. Top with the olive oil, which will settle on and around the cheese. Serve with toasted bread, and top with sliced figs or olives (or shaved truffles.)
